Headline: Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running w/residual delays & congestion following earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at Roosevelt. Service resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks near Roosevelt.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
